patthana23.44:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasavitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.44:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naavitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.44:6.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naavitakkaavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho avitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.44:6.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
